definition: within the next few days/in a few days time
(negative prefix)/not/no
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month

sentences.english: Our purchase confirmation will be sent to you very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我方订货确认书不日将寄达你处。

sentences.english: Reportedly, the land mass estimates will soon be commenced construction.
sentences.chinese: 据透露，该地块估计不日将开始动工建设。

sentences.english: The cargo vessel will arrive at the port within the next few days.
sentences.chinese: 那艘货船不日即可抵港。

sentences.english: But he was cruel to her, and after a while he left her.
sentences.chinese: 然而他对她很残暴，不日之后还离开了她。

definition: the day after tomorrow/from hence/from now/from now on/henceforth
this or that very day/in the next few days
future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
(literary) ten days/short period
to return to the capital
to report on completion of a mission/debriefing
to set out/to leave
to travel day and night
already
day before yesterday
to come with a specific purpose in mind
to spur the horse to full speed (idiom)/to go as fast as possible
tomorrow
to travel at double speed/to make all haste
time/auspicious time/time and date/long period of time/this day
last year
